## IConfigDocModel interface

Configures how the doc model file (\*.api.json) will be generated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IConfigDocModel 
```

## Remarks

This is part of the [IConfigFile](./api-extractor.iconfigfile.md) structure.
